Content.Text:
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>! If you want to go
on a trip, please ask my dad. He'll fly
you on his plane in a jiffy.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>! Are you going to
work, now? Working on a farm seems like
a lot of fun.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>! You know, my dad
says morning calisthenics are good for
you.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, it's <MYNAME>! If you're not doing
anything, will you play with me?

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi, <MYNAME>. Dad says that you're great.
<PAGE>
If Dad says so, you really must be
amazing, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi, <MYNAME>. Buildings move so quickly
in this town, don't they?
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>You're the one doing it, <MYNAME>? That's
amazing!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening. <MYNAME>, you sure run fast,
don't you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Can you teach me how to run sometime? I
want to surprise Mom and Dad.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Mom and Dad won't
allow me to go out at night.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I wonder if I'll be able to go out when
I'm a little older?

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Have you ever
tasted my mom's cooking? It's really
delicious!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's you, <MYNAME>. I've been wanting
to play with you.
<PAGE>
The weather cleared up so nicely. Let's
play together. Please, say yes!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. It's raining today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I have to be careful about keeping
my clothes clean on rainy days. If I get
them muddy, Mom gets so angry.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's <MYNAME>. Isn't it such a clear
day today? Mom was happily doing her
wash.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you know, <MYNAME>? Even if it's 
raining, when you go up on an airplane,
the skies are clear.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'm not kidding. Dad took me up in his
plane.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you know, <MYNAME>? There were so many
little clouds, so I asked my dad.
<PAGE>
He said they're called cirro-cumulus
clouds. Don't you think my dad is smart?

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
When I listen to the pitter-patter of
the rain, I get sleepy. Mmm, I want to
lie on my bed.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Isn't it cold, <MYNAME>? But I'm going
to bear it because of the snow. Playing
in the snow is so much fun.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Mom and Dad told me to stay indoors
until it stops snowing. I can't wait to
go outside...

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm scared, <MYNAME>. The wind is
blowing so hard. Mom, Dad, stay with me.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I can't believe it's snowing so hard.
When it stops snowing, I'm going to make
a snowman!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I heard, <MYNAME>! You got yourself a
sweetheart, right? Congratulations♪
<PAGE>
I can't wait to find a handsome
boyfriend too.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There were animals right before my eyes
earlier. I tried walking up to them very
quietly, but they ran away.
<PAGE>
I wonder how I can become friends with
the animals? Can you teach me,
<MYNAME>?

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are so many ways to play here. You
can climbs the trees and make toys...
it's so much fun.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Stay here and play too, <MYNAME>. I
promise, you'll have lots of fun.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, have you ever been in the river?
Something good's supposed to happen,
but Mom won't let me go in.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mom says the water in this river is 
really clear and great for doing the
wash. I help her too.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
We came hiking here recently. Mom, Dad
and I had a meal, then played together.
<PAGE>
It was so much fun. You have to come
next time, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, can we see your house from here?
<PAGE>
My house is...over there. Not that way.
Yes, this way. Do you see it?

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, your farm is big. My house seems
small. Is it all right if I play here?
<PAGE>
Can I? Oh, thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I really like the farm. I'm going to
make this my special place. And I'm
going to play to my heart's content.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, <MYNAME>, you can get precious stones
from a mine, can't you?
<PAGE>
Isn't it strange that such pretty things
are buried in this desolate place?

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A mine is such a mysterious place! It
feels like a subterranean man might
leap out!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There aren't many people in this town.
But I have my mom and dad, so I don't
get lonely.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Lately, all kinds of people have moved
here. The town is becoming prettier, and
every day's been fun.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town has gotten so lively. Mom and
Dad are really happy too.
<PAGE>
The shop's gotten busy, so they don't
get to play with me as often.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>But it's okay 'cuz I have more friends
and I can play outside all I want.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dunhill looks scary, but I think he's
actually very kind.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I mean, the first time I met him, he
gave me candy. I just know he's nice.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, do you like to play outdoors?
I love it. I feel so excited when I'm
outside.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love this town! I mean, everyone's so
much fun. <MYNAME>, you're fun too.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mom and Dad are the ideal couple. I'd
like to marry a cool, handsome man like
Dad.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so proud of my Mom and Dad! They're
the best parents in the world. They're
so kind to me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY><MYNAME>, don't say means things about Mom
and Dad! I won't have it!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The town I used to live in had nowhere
to play like this town does.
<PAGE>
Since coming here, it's been so much fun
playing outside.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you always play with me.
<PAGE>
I love you, <MYNAME>. But not as much as
I love my mom and dad. Heh heh...

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow! A pudding ala mode!
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I ate it with Mom in the town we used
to live in. It looks so yummy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'm going to eat it later with Mom and
Dad. Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, that's a nice thing you have. Is
it for me? Thank you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Eheheh...I'm going to show Mom and Dad.
They'll be so happy.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Huh? For me? Oh, thank you, <MYNAME>! I'm
so happy!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A present for me? Oh thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I don't like this! Take it back. I'm
going to tell Dad on you.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You're mean, <MYNAME>! Why are you so
mean?! I'm going to tell Dad on you!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, <MYNAME>! I didn't ask for a seafood
bowl!
<PAGE>
Oh, I don't care for it. I'll give it to
Dad.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Such large strawberries. You're giving
them to me? Yes!
<PAGE>
I'm going to ask Mom to make me all
sorts of desserts. I can't wait!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Such large vegetables. Huh? They're for
me? 
<PAGE>
Uh-huh, I'll ask Mom to cook them. Thank
you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow! The strawberries are huge! They're
for me?!
<PAGE>
Yay! I can eat my fill! I love you, 
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
These vegetables are huge. They're for
me?
<PAGE>
Uh-huh, I'll ask Mom to cook them. She's
going to be so surprised. Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Why are you giving it to me? I
don't need it.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can't carry any more. I'm sorry,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Uh-huh, today is my birthday. Huh? A
present? What is it?
<PAGE>
Oh! Pudding ala mode! I love this!
<PAGE>
Oh, it's delicious! Thank you,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present for me? Thank you,
<MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
How did you know what I liked? I love
you, <MYNAME><RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is my birthday present? Oh, I
really wanted this.
<PAGE>
Your bag contains things that I like,
<MYNAME>. How nice.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present for me? Thank you,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I really appreciate it, <MYNAME>, but you
didn't have to get me a present.
<PAGE>
I mean, Mom always says it's the thought
that counts. Thank you.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You don't understand how I feel at all,
<MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
Why would I ever want this for my
birthday?!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Huh? This seafood bowl is my birthday
present?
<PAGE>
You're quite insensitive, <MYNAME>. This
is my least favorite thing. No, it's
all right. As long as you know.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Such huge strawberries. For my birthday?
Yes!
<PAGE>
I'm going to ask Mom to make me a cake
with them. I can't wait!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Such large vegetables. Huh? For my
birthday?
<PAGE>
Uh-huh, I'll ask Mom to cook them. Thank
you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow! The strawberries are huge! They're
for me for my birthday?!
<PAGE>
Yay! I can eat my fill! I love you, 
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
These vegetables are huge. They're for
me for my birthday?
<PAGE>
Uh-huh, I'll ask Mom to cook them. She's
going to be so surprised. Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
O-Ow... That's my finger, hey. Don't
peck at it.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
She lays eggs? Well, thank you for
laying such yummy eggs.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
She's so big. I'm so surprised.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mmm, what a cute dog. But I prefer cats.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
They're a little overweight. I feel
sorry for them, <MYNAME>

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So big... It almost makes me want to
hop on and go for a ride.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>, you're overfeeding them. Poor
thing can't even run.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Cute <RED>∀</RED>. To be honest, I wish
I had a pet cat at home. Maybe I can
coax Mom...

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The chubby kitty is so cute. Aww, I wish
I could take it home with me!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Isn't the long fur so cute?<RED>∀</RED>
To be honest, I wish I had a pet cat at
home. Maybe I can coax Mom...

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
How have you been, chubby kitty? You're
so fun to look at.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, thank you for the flowers. I'll
take good care of them.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A present from the Pumpkin Festival?
Thank you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I knew you would give me one, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Sure, I know. The blue shuttlecock,
right?
<PAGE>
Mom and Dad cherish it. They made it
when they got married.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Sure, I know. The ring, right?
<PAGE>
Mom and Dad cherish it. They show it to
me often.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, the chicken is your friend? Can you
teach me how to hold her later?

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
How did you become her friend,
<MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
Come on, tell me. I want to be her
friend too!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The turtle is so much fun. She moves so
slow.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy birthday! It's your birthday,
right, <MYNAME>? Are you surprised?
<PAGE>
Eheheh, this is my present. Here you go.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Huh? Today is <MYNAME>'s birthday? I'm
sorry, I don't have a present.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh, <MYNAME>, play with me some more.
Are you trying to run away?

Dad... Where are you going to take me
next time? Yawn...

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? You're going to play with me?
<PAGE>
But I'm eating now and Mom will scold
me.
<PAGE>
I'll finish quickly, so please wait,
okay?

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yellow benches are nice. It's my
favorite color.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Pink benches are nice. I want to sit on
one with Mom.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I want to sit on the white bench with my
dad.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What an unusual table. I love unusual
things.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a bright bench, but what's
it for?
<PAGE>
Oh, it's a place to drink tea? I'd like
some tea too.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a parasol! Who would use such a
thing? I'm sure it's someone who is
bigger than Dad.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That thing over there made of stones
that looks like a little house...is that
what you call a garden lantern?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It looks so sturdy, I'll bet if it
turned human, it would be just like Dad.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There's a hammock! It looks so
comfortable.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>But I don't
think I can lie in it. My balance isn't
good and I might fall.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That looks like a fun thing to ride! Can
I get on? Can I?
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I can't? Really? That's quite
stingy of you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A mechanical panda, what fun! Oh please,
can I ride it? Please!
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I can't? Really? That's quite stingy of
you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A robot! Wow! It's so big!
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Say, doesn't it move? Oh, how boring.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are so many interesting things
around here. It's like a theme park.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a huge park. I'd like to stroll
around a park like this with Mom and
Dad.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What an amazing garden! There are so
many flowers, and even a fountain. This
is like a garden in a palace.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Pink roses are pretty, aren't they? I
like to color pink.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The marguerites are in bloom. I love
marguerites. Please take good care of
them.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Bright red tulips. I like tulips and the
color red too.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My favorite flower is a bright red rose.
My mom and dad love it too. I mean, it's
so beautiful.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
White roses are in bloom. White flowers
are pretty, aren't they?

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Such a pretty red flower. It's called a
gerbera. It's a flower I like.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Small white flowers. These are
snowdrops. It's such a dainty flower.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cactuses are full of thorns which look
very painful. But their white flowers
are very pretty.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Pink roses are pretty. I like the color
pink.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Marguerites are in bloom. I love
marguerites. Please take good care of
them.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Bright red tulips. I like tulips and
the color red too.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My favorite flower is a bright red rose.
My mom and dad love them too. I mean,
they're so beautiful.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
White roses are in bloom. White flowers
are pretty, aren't they?

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Such a pretty red flower. It's called a
gerbera. It's a flower I like.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Small white flowers. These are
snowdrops. It's such a dainty flower.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cactuses are full of thorns which look
very painful. But their white flowers
are very pretty.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A cow ornament! It's so well made, it
almost looks alive!
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I wish I had one too... Maybe Dad can
make me one.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A sheep ornament! It's so well made, it
almost looks alive!
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I wish I had one too... Maybe Dad can
make me one.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A chicken ornament! It's so well made,
it almost looks alive.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Imagine if it lays an egg one day...
Heh heh.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A horse ornament! It's so well made, it
almost looks alive.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>How I wish I could ride it, but I guess
I can't. I know. I'm a good girl.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I get so excited when I walk under the
arch. I feel like I'm entering a fairy
tale world.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I get so excited when I walk under the
arch. I feel like I'm entering a fairy
tale world.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fence is shaped like a cow! Isn't
it fun?
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I wish our house had a cow fence. I
wish someone would make us one.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fence is shaped like a sheep!
Isn't it fun?
<PAGE>
<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I wish our house had a sheep fence. I
wish someone would make us one.

I'm not going to present my gift right
now.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm going to the hair salon and become
pretty, just like Mom.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I can't wait to go to the clothes shop. 
You can try to many kinds of fashions.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mom's cooking is great, but I heard that
the food at the restaurant is good.
Although I don't like fish.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When it comes to traveling, leave it to
my agency. I promise you a wonderful and
memorable trip.
<PAGE>
That's what Mom always tells the 
customers.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The tea salon has something I love.
That's...pudding a la mode!

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love to move. You can go to all kinds
of places, and make lots of friends.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's fun when there are lots of towns.
There are more fun places to go, and
your friends could visit too.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mom said that the town scenery is
looking more westernized, but it would
be great if town becomes pretty.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mom said that the town scenery is
looking more eastern, but I wonder
what that's like. Seems sorta boring.

<FACE_HINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mom said there the town scenery is
looking more tropical, but it would be
nice if there are more places to play.
